meanings.definition: The act or practice of repairing or modifying firearms.
meanings.sent1: His gunsmithings on the old rifle made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: She learned gunsmithings from her grandfather who was a skilled gunsmith.
meanings.sent3: The town's annual fair featured a quirky competition of gunsmithings on toy guns.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to gunsmithings turned his hobby into a thriving business.
meanings.sent5: The intricate art of gunsmithings requires patience and precision.

meanings.definition: The skill or trade of a person who repairs or modifies firearms.
meanings.sent1: His expertise in gunsmithings was evident in the flawless restoration of the antique shotgun.
meanings.sent2: The local gun shop offers courses in gunsmithings for those interested in the craft.
meanings.sent3: During the gunsmithings workshop, the apprentice accidentally painted a gun pink.
meanings.sent4: The gunsmith's mastery of gunsmithings was unmatched in the entire region.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of gunsmithings fascinated the visitors at the gun show.
